Reviews.Title: “never never never again!”
Reviews.Author: mehdi a
Reviews.Content: the staffs were impolite and service was so auwful.i [--] the manager of the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “SMART 3 STAR HOTEL”
Reviews.Author: Amira T
Reviews.Content: I enjoyed my stay totally. I think for a 3 star it is a quiet good hotel. At least proper and secure.

Reviews.Title: “A GREAT TREATMENT!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: AliciaMartinMartin
Reviews.Content: I want to thank to the people of the hotel the great treatment I had being there, Meanwhile I was in Stambul, I had an accident that made me stay lying in bed till I could go back to Spain. All that time the people of the hotel was taking care of me. IÂ´m very greatful with them.

Reviews.Title: “Stinking smell is everywhere...”
Reviews.Author: hussein_alidani
Reviews.Content: I am not sure if the Turkish government has a look on this hotel... Sorry, but I don't think it is a good place to stay in and have a leisure... I believe it is a stinking place in garden as Istanbul is very nice and wonderful city but the hotel is dirty and you smell the bad smell of the carpet humidity which has never been replaced since the hotel opened as I believe... I got the reservation from airport and they gave me a great idea and cheated me actually while this place should be taken out of Istanbul and get rid of it... Our trip was good but the stay there for two days the worst thing happened to us in this lovely country...

Reviews.Title: “Great value!”
Reviews.Author: kizas
Reviews.Content: This small hotel in Fatih is great value for 25 euros,rooms are really ok since they are recently renovated.Also on the 6th floor there is a small restaurant were you take breakfast every morning which is also new.Since the hotel is centrally located in Istanbul you have an easy acess to all major atractions-Sultanahmet 20m. walking or 10m. tram station,Chora church 15m. walking or you can take a taxi which is 3 euros.Also you have a free wifi in the hotel ,only make sure that you room is close to the elevator since the signal is not so good if you are away.For the people-travelers who don't need much just a place to sleep and a cosy breakfast I will recomend this hotel.Don't go to this hotel if you are expecting great service and good breakfast better pay more and go to one of the hotels in Sultanahmet!

Reviews.Title: “What do you expect for Â£25 a night”
Reviews.Author: marshfoot
Reviews.Content: Having read the reviews on this hotel I am amazed at what people expect. Istanbul is a very expensive place for hotels with mostly small rooms and busy streets. The Pianoforte is in the Fathi district very busy but safe. This hotel has reasonable rooms in reasonable condition and is reasonably clean. The staff are friendly and for Â£25 per night is absolutely amazing value for Istanbul. The people who are complaining about this and that with the hotel must have strange expectations of a hotel this cheap. You get what you pay for but a place to rest after business or sightseeing you can not beat this value. Free Wi Fi to boot.

Reviews.Title: “nightmare”
Reviews.Author: robinalan
Reviews.Content: it was a nightmare I stayed three nights ,first night I was at room with very stincky smell that i could not breath,second night I was out (no sleep),3rd night I asked for other room ,which was full of cockroaches ,a nigth mare ,the reception asked 60 dollar for lift yo aiport ,I found a taxi who asked only 20 TRK

Reviews.Title: “poor quality hotel”
Reviews.Author: azimel
Reviews.Content: we were supposed to find a gym and a restaurant, but they were closed.

Reviews.Title: “Okay but where did they get the stars from?”
Reviews.Author: maritsch
Reviews.Content: Great location, quite central, small shops and restaurants nearby. The toilet smell in the lobby is indeed annoying. Staff tries hard to please and is friendly. Breakfast is boring but you dont go hungry. All in all it is a place you can stay at but I don't understand the star system if this is a four star hotel and five is the maximum...?

Reviews.Title: “very plesant stay!”
Reviews.Author: chiaraclear
Reviews.Content: whoever was complainting about this hotel should know that every room was completely renovated in december 08 and now they are very clean and comfortable. a/c water working perfectly and the peolpe working at the reception are very helpful. i've been staying here for one week and i had a helt problem which they helped me to solve coming with me at the clinic ant keeping me company and assisting me for the whole treatment! they didn't have to but they did very nicely and compassionate...how much can you rate this? the position is not so central but very well served by all kind of tranports. i highly raccomend it also for the very convenient price and the hammam facilities.

Reviews.Title: “can't find worst that this”
Reviews.Author: adi_amp
Reviews.Content: Never go to this hotel. Starting with the toillet smell in the lobby and a great temperature of 16 degrees celcius in the room. All the walls were full of mold and the bathroom was not clean since last year i guess. For the 4 days we stood there nobody entered our room to clean up except the trash can. The breakfast consisted in a very pink salami, some cheese, a little turkish tea but with very bad taste and the same menu was available every day. Almost nobody in the hotel's stuff speaks english. I will never recommend this hotel to anyone not even to those trying to have a holiday on lowest budget.

HotelInfo.Name: Pianoforte Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Feyzullah Efendi Cd No. 17, Kiztasi-Fatih, Istanbul 34620, Turkey
